headline.main: NBC HEAD DENIES CURB ON ISOLATIONIST VIEW; Trammel Calls America First Charges 'Unjustifiable'

lead_paragraph: Niles Trammel, president of the National Broadcasting Company, made public yesterday a telegram to the New York Chapter of the America First Committee, denying the charge by the chapter that the major radio networks have "barred" America First spokesmen from the air.
